El día que quiten la habilidad para asesino "INSIDIOSO" y pongan un metodo anticampeo para los asesinos. Ese día volveré a jugar superviviente.
Mientras tanto en pleno Rango 1 la gente sigue usando dichas habilidades y haciendo Tunneling and Face Camping lo cual no se que es peor, quedarse en Rango 20 con gente apenas ayuda o subir a Rango 1 para que los asesinos te campeen.
Añado, que tambien hay un metodo de baneo en el juego que es muy bonito de decoración y inutil.

Me encanta este juego pero creo que la comunidad esta repleta de gente toxica (el 70% ya, que tambien hay gente muy maja y que colabora). Ojala que añadan un metodo anticampeo o esten intentando solventar dicho problema

GIVE US FREE KILLER AND SURVIVORS ! (please XD)
Hello killer!

For a competitive game the game is rather disappointing, and the only game type is competitive. There is no actual punishment for people leaving or disconnecting early. Your rank will go down 2 "points" but not necessarily even a whole level, and honestly who even cares, there is no reward for reaching a top tier rank anyways. So why not de-rank and play against people who don't know what they are doing instead of play against killers who are rewarded by playing into "tunneling" and "basement camping" and other tactics that gain them more points. A huge flaw with the system is the host of the game is the killer, allowing other things like "lag switching".  Playing today I had 3 games in a row where someone had disconnected or didn't load through. and it has left 3 other people to most likely de-rank as well. The "balance" of taking away one generator that survivors have to do if someone doesn't load into the game doesn't outway the earlygame necessity of keeping killer's distracted while other people can work on generator's. That is ialso if you have the benefit of being in a party with your other survivors. Beside's the beginning of the game there is no communication besides in game gesture's and learned action's. The game truthfully seems to lack balance whether you are playing as the killer or the survivor. The game is a lot of fun, but there are some really big changes that should be made to make the game more competitive.

Прикольно

This negative review is due to the fact that the game breaks regularly.  The developers clearly have a very limited (or nonexistent) knowledge of how to test for instability issue BEFORE implementing expansions or updates, leading to a constantly buggy, and regularly unplayable game.  It takes several attempts, sometimes exceeding ten or more, just to successfully join AND launch a single match with friends without someone crashing.  Stability is a very VERY weak point of this game, and until the developers fix this, my review will remain negative.

Simply put:
Behavior Digital Inc, stop adding updates until you've learned how to do so without regularly compromising the stability of your game, AND stabilized your game to begin with.

Great game with good potential. However, devs balanced the game with survive with friends with communications. Which is pretty bad if you do solo queue or you just duo with a friend because you don't have any communication with your whole team and it gives a big disadvantage for the survivors. In this case, the killers will be much more stronger than survivors and that's boring for the ones who are concerned. It's still a good scary game :)

Омерзительная оптимизация, на новых картах невозможно играть. Под "новым контентом" разработчики подразумевают донатные скины, бесконечные загрузки (и попиздите что она просто очень долгая, пристарелая бабка успеет покарить Эверест пока ты присоединишься), я уже молчу о багах по типу невидимых стен на краю карты, статичных моделях при беге ("но это же мелочи" скажет недоразвитый уебан, для которого игра вышедшая 3 года назад недоделана, но платный контент добавляется блять. Никаких наказаний за кемп, за ожидание смерти команды и побег в люк.

乱封号，莫名其妙被封号，从来没有改过档刷过血点，被误封后还申诉过多次，都是机器人回复，说我改档，2016年7月购买这个游戏已经玩了4454个小时，从未违反过游戏规定，官方反作弊人员乱封号，完了不给申诉人员受理，我已经提交过我的录像里面有我整个仓库录像和成就录像包括各种截图照片！但是迟迟不予解决，一直是机器人回复，真的是游戏界的耻辱，让我看到黎明杀机反作弊人员对游戏玩家黑暗的处理方式感到无助和绝望！
G N O M E
Jogue com amigos, ou passe MUITA raiva

En sí, es un gran juego, pero tiene una comunidad demasiado tóxica. A todo le dicen campeo, hasta cuando jugas como superviviente te reportan sólo porque no toleran perder, sin importar el papel que tomes. Si sos asesino, te reportan por supuesto campeo si los matas y sí sos superviviente, te reportan por supuesto campeo si no te matan... Ahh pero ojo, ellos te pueden trollear haciendo que el asesino corra en círculos, pero eso no es un mal modo de juego... Conclusión: una comunidad llena de pelotudos.
Dejenme aclarar algo, a mi no me gusta el campeo, me esfuerzo mucho por perseguirlos todo el tiempo, no quedarme nunca en el mismo lugar y estar siempre en movimiento, pero aún así me insultan por campeo, incluso cuando no logro matar a ninguno y a todo eso sumenle el hecho de que soy mujer, los insultos se multiplican. Es por eso que no lo recomiendo, el juego es muy bueno, pero no vale la pena jugar con gente así
